trans-unit.source: When a service that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class encounters an exception that it cannot handle, it can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method to tell the workflow runtime engine to raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un servicio que deriva de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> se encuentra con una excepción que no puede administrar, puede llamar al método <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> para avisar al motor en tiempo de ejecución de flujo de trabajo que provoque el evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The service passes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance and the <xref:System.Exception> associated with this event in its call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El servicio pasa <xref:System.Guid> de la instancia de flujo de trabajo y <xref:System.Exception> asociado a este evento en su llamada a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine encapsulates these parameters in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs> and raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: El motor en tiempo de ejecución de flujo de trabajo encapsula estos parámetros en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs> y genera el evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: From inside of a subscriber to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, you can read the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to get the information associated with a particular <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: De dentro de un suscriptor al evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType>, usted puede leer la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> y la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> para obtener la información asociada a un evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=nameWithType> determinado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la excepción que no pudo ser controlada por el servicio.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that represents the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> que representa la excepción que no pudo ser controlada por el servicio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> de la instancia de flujo de trabajo asociado a la excepción no controlada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> de la instancia de flujo de trabajo asociado a la excepción no controlada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> of the workflow instance associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> es equivalente a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> de la instancia de flujo de trabajo asociado al evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>.
